title: Flashlight for Android Wear
summary: Turn your smart watch powered by Android Wear into a flashlight.

description: A clean and easy to use app that turns your smart watch powered by Android Wear into a flashlight.This app is great if you are in the dark and you need some light.Choose from a range of colours such as white, blue, cyan, grey, green, magenta, red, yellow and colours mix effect.Android and Android Wear are trademarks of Google Inc.End User License Agreement: http://www.disrapptive.com/end-user-license-agreementPrivacy Policy: http://www.disrapptive.com/privacy-policy
descriptionHTML:
A clean and easy to use app that turns your smart watch powered by Android Wear into a flashlight.
This app is great if you are in the dark and you need some light.
Choose from a range of colours such as white, blue, cyan, grey, green, magenta, red, yellow and colours mix effect.

Android and Android Wear are trademarks of Google Inc.

End User License Agreement: http://www.disrapptive.com/end-user-license-agreement
Privacy Policy: http://www.disrapptive.com/privacy-policy
comments: Garbage Not clean. not easy. No voice command option.
Wow! Love it! It lights my Samsung Gear Live with white and lots of colours. Easy to use and great tutorial. Thanks so much.
